channel.title: Planetside 2
channel.description:
Its a f2p game with a never ending war between 3 factions over 3 continents(literally, the battlefield is 3 entire continents).
http://www.planetside2.com/
discuss

item.title: Planetside 2

if anyone is on the woodman eu server, me and about 5 other people (including speljohan and brolapse) frequently play over mumble
[/quote]

i might just join you. what faction?[/quote]

nc fuck yeah coming to smurf the motherfucking day yeaahhhhhh

item.title: Planetside 2
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

There’s a lot of bugs and optimization issues but other than that it’s a great game, I’ve got one character on the US East server Jaeger with battle-rank 17 and a little over 60 hours of gameplay in so far.

Read full topic
